enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the state of the composite collection by adding or removing elements.
Both methods involve modifying the composite collection by adding or removing multiple elements.
Both methods involve removing elements from the composite collection, though removeAll removes multiple elements at once.
It is beneficial to check if the object exists in the collection before attempting to remove it.
The iterator method can be used to traverse the collection and remove elements, which is similar to the remove method's operation.
